description: Enterprise Windows/OS Infrastructure monitoring with enhanced CPU (Current/Average/Maximum), Memory, Disk, Network metrics

targets.expr: avg(100 - ((windows_logical_disk_free_bytes{volume=~"C:|D:", team=~"$team", environment=~"$environment", ip=~"$ip"} / windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume=~"C:|D:", team=~"$team", environment=~"$environment", ip=~"$ip"}) * 100))
